name: Webixion Technologies LLC
description:
Webixion Technologies LLC provides cost effective web and mobile solutions worldwide for 11 years.
Our Services - - Web & Mobile Re-Engineering services - Product Development & Maintenance - Writing SRS, Feasibility Study & Other Market Research Services - Native & Hybrid Mobile Applications - Test Cases development and dedicated QA services are why clients prefer Webixion Technologies - - Backed by 35+ dedicated high skilled software professionals - a State of the art development center with 24 hrs power backup and multiple internet leased lines - Excellent written and verbal English communication - Leading freelancer service provider in India - 24/7 support (multiple phone lines) - Milestone based development approach - Internal KANBAN based project management system - Agile methodology to accommodate changes and thoughts at any stage of development
